scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc --build && npm run assets && npm install --omit=dev --prefix=dist/tarot-bot
scripts.watch: npm run clean && tsc && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TypeScript,Node" -c "cyan.bold,green.bold" "tsc -w --preserveWatchOutput" "nodemon --delay 100ms dist/tarot-bot/index.js"
scripts.assets: copyfiles package.json dist/tarot-bot && copyfiles package-lock.json dist/tarot-bot
